item.title: By: ellen
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.description: The 14 page article is nothing new. The same article appeared in the Hebrew weekly Makor Rishon last spring. Rabbi Sholom Gold criticized the article in a letter the editor and Rabbi Riskin responded. A comprehensive critique of Rabbi Riskin's article is being prepared by Jewishisrael.com in both Hebrew and English.
